article_title: Jacksonville hospital poised to join Memorial

article_metadata.description: Passavant Area Hospital plans to join Memorial Health System and become the Springfield-based system’s second-largest affiliate as soon as this spring. Officials from the independent 93-bed hospital say they are moving forward with the affiliation to ensure they can afford to maintain and expand services.
article_metadata.author: Dean Olsen Staff Writer
